summary:
"Toy Story" (1995) was the first fully computer-animated movie, made by Pixar and Disney. It's about toys that come alive when people aren't around. The story follows Woody, an old cowboy doll, and Buzz Lightyear, a new space toy, who become rivals for their owner Andy's attention.

The film was a big success, making lots of money and getting great reviews. It was praised for its new animation technology, funny script, and voice actors like Tom Hanks and Tim Allen. "Toy Story" started a popular franchise with sequels, spin-offs, and short films.
title: Toy Story
